hero.lead: Private, decentralized cryptocurrency that keeps your finances confidential and secure.

aboutDescription: Watch this video to understand the basics of how Monero works. For more in-depth understanding of the technology behind Monero, watch more explanatory videos.
privacyText: Monero respects privacy by providing full anonymity and untraceable transactions for users.
decentralizedText: With more than 5000 nodes, Monero is one of the most decentralized cryptocurrencies that exist.
communityText: Monero is developed and evolved by its community, more than 500 developers have contributed to the project.
startDescription: Follow these steps to get started with Monero. If you are new to crypto, we recommend learning the basic security measures you can take to keep your funds safe.
step1Desc: To use Monero, the first thing you are going to need is a wallet. Visit our Downloads page and find the right wallet for you.
step2Desc: You can acquire Monero by mining or working in exchange for Monero, but the easiest way is to use an exchange to convert your fiat money into XMR.
step3Desc: Once Monero is in your wallet, you can exchange it for goods, services and other currencies, privately and with very low fees.
resourcesDescription: Explore the knowledge base to learn everything about Monero, from basic blockchain terms to advanced privacy mechanisms and technology.
faqDesc: We've heard a lot of questions over the years and have compiled a thorough and varied FAQ. Don't worry, if your questions are not in there, you can always ask the [community](/community/hangouts/).
moneroDocsDesc: Comprehensive guides for users and developers to use Monero effectively and securely.
